arts.ttl: Who is Abdukodir Khusanov? The Manchester City defensive target
arts.sum: RC Lens has reportedly accepted a $41 million for Abdukodir Khusanov, who is regarded as one of the best young defenders in French soccer.

arts.ttl: What Man City are planning to do in the transfer market after Omar Marmoush, Abdukodir Khusanov and Victor Reis deals
arts.sum: Manchester City are making a strong push in the January transfer window to bolster Pep Guardiola’s squad and their latest plans have been revealed. The...

arts.ttl: ‘There is no ultimatum’ – Le Havre president offers a vote of confidence to Didier Digard
arts.sum: Despite his club’s current form, Didier Digard is not in danger of being sacked for now. Le Havre AC president Jean-Michel Roussier offered his assurances to the club’s head coach,…

arts.ttl: Lens predicted XI v Le Havre: Manchester City-bound Abdukodir Khusanov to miss out
arts.sum: Abdukodir Khusanov, in the process of completing a €50m move to Manchester City, is set to miss RC Lens’ game against Le Havre AC this Sunday. The Uzbekistan international missed…

arts.ttl: Marseille join the race to sign Lens’ Kevin Danso
arts.sum: Abdukodir Khusanov (20) looks set to complete a move away from RC Lens. The Uzbekistan international is set to join Manchester City in a €50m deal and, as a result, Les…

arts.ttl: Lens make official Khusanov statement after Man City agreement
arts.sum: RC Lens have announced that Abdukodir Khusanov will not take part in their match against Le Havre as he gears up for his big-money transfer to Manchester City . Lens have now officially revealed their squad for Sunday's clash with Le Havre and, unsurprisingly, Khusanov won't feature, having not participated in training in recent days.

arts.ttl: Man City agree £33.6m deal for Lens defender Khusanov
arts.sum: Manchester City agree £33.6m deal with Lens for Uzbekistan central defender Abdukodir Khusanov.

arts.ttl: Nantes consider move for former Lens midfielder Jean Onana
arts.sum: Jean Onana (25) could be returning to France this winter, according to a report from Foot Mercato. The Cameroonian midfielder had spent the majority of his career in Ligue 1…

arts.ttl: Lens target Cyriaque Irié, Brentford and Leicester also interested
